## Hints.IHintApplicator.validateHint() method

Validates that a hint can be safely applied to the given state.

**Signature:**

```typescript
validateHint(hint: IHint, puzzle: Puzzle, state: PuzzleState, loggingContext?: ISudokuLoggingContext): Result<void>;
```
